itemizedlist.listitem: The HTTP request header contains lines of request information.
Every user-agent (browser) sends at least one request line to the Web server.
The "lines" argument in VSPs is an array of the user-agent request lines.

refsect1.title: Methods for accessing the request parameters

itemizedlist.listitem: A specific attribute can be accessed with the http_request_header() function.
The header lines can be accessed with aref() function.
Parsing the header line can be done with the split_and_decode() function.

refsect1.title: Cookie Demo
refsect1.para: This example shows how to set a cookie in the user-agent, and displaying a cookie string when retrieved.

itemizedlist.listitem: Setting the cookie is done with the http_header() function. (see also:VS-B-5)
Retrieving the cookie string is done with http_request_header() function.
